Email Configuration¶

The Email Configuration settings section contains the settings to help you define Email notification templates and what emails to send, to access, point your web browser to http://yourdomain.com/admin/configuration/email where yourdomain.com is your actual domain name.

Available settings include:

Messages to send
  • Welcome
  • Activation
Messages Templates
  • Welcome Email
  • Account Activation Email
  • Token Access Email
  • Incognito Access Email
  • Password Recovery Email
  • Email Template
